title: LDLR variant classification through activity-normalized prime editing screening.
abstract: Inherited variants in the LDL receptor (  We developed an innovative, activity-normalized prime editing screening pipeline to measure the impact of 5,184  We show that prime editing-mediated reporter editing correlates with endogenous variant installation frequency, allowing activity normalization to improve imputation of  Altogether, our approach demonstrates the power of prime editing to significantly improve understanding of how variants in
